folder.name: DockMenu
folder.tiptext: Mac OS X like menu bar component

string.name: autoHide
string.tiptext: Enables and disables the auto hide mode

string.name: autoHideTime
string.tiptext: Time it takes to show/hide

string.name: barAlpha
string.tiptext: Changes the bar alpha

string.name: barColor
string.tiptext: Changes the bar color

string.name: barPaddingBottom
string.tiptext: Sets the padding bottom margin

string.name: barPaddingSides
string.tiptext: Sets the padding sides margin

string.name: barPaddingTop
string.tiptext: Sets the padding top margin

string.name: borderAlpha
string.tiptext: Changes the bar border alpha

string.name: borderColor
string.tiptext: Changes the bar border color

string.name: cacheIcons
string.tiptext: Enables icon bitmap caching

string.name: captionShadow
string.tiptext: Enables or disables the caption shadow

string.name: captionShadowColor
string.tiptext: Changes the caption shadow color

string.name: clickEffect
string.tiptext: A value from the DockMenuClickEffect class that specifies the click effect

string.name: clickEffectAmount
string.tiptext: Number of times the effect plays

string.name: clickEffectTime
string.tiptext: Time it takes for one effect cycle to complete

string.name: dataProvider
string.tiptext: A DataProvider collection that contains DockMenuIconData elements that describe each icon

string.name: embedFonts
string.tiptext: Embeds fonts for the caption

string.name: magnificationSpan
string.tiptext: The range of icons affected by magnification

string.name: magnificationTime
string.tiptext: Time it takes for magnification animation

string.name: maxIconSize
string.tiptext: Maximun icon size

string.name: minIconSize
string.tiptext: Minimun icon size

string.name: position
string.tiptext: A value from the DockMenuPosition class that specifies the dock position of the component

string.name: reflectionAlpha
string.tiptext: Sets the alpha of the icon reflection

string.name: reflectionSize
string.tiptext: Sets the size of the reflection

string.name: selectedItem
string.tiptext: Gets a DockMenuIconData object with the the data of the currently seleced icon

string.name: showReflection
string.tiptext: Shows or hides the icon reflection

string.name: useSelectedIndicator
string.tiptext: Determines whether to show a selected icon indicator ot not

string.name: DockMenu
string.tiptext: Creates a new DockMenu instance.

string.name: getCaptionFormat
string.tiptext: Returns a format object for the caption

string.name: setCaptionFormat
string.tiptext: Sets the format for the caption

string.name: iconClick
string.tiptext: iconClick event

string.name: iconRollOut
string.tiptext: iconRollOut event

string.name: iconRollOver
string.tiptext: iconRollOver event

folder.name: DockMenuIconData
folder.tiptext: Represents the data of each icon in the DockMenu bar.

string.name: icon
string.tiptext: It is the class used to create the icon.

string.name: caption
string.tiptext: The text used as the icon caption.

string.name: link
string.tiptext: The page, image or MovieClip to link with.

string.name: target
string.tiptext: The target frame, MovieClip or frame number to link with.

string.name: linkType
string.tiptext: A value from the DockMenuLinkType class that specifies the link type.

string.name: DockMenuIconData
string.tiptext: Creates a new DockMenuIconData instance.

string.name: clone
string.tiptext: Creates a copy of the DockMenuIconData object and sets each property's value to match that of the original.

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Returns a string that contains all the properties of the DockMenuIconData object.

folder.name: DockMenuClickEffect
folder.tiptext: DockMenuClickEffect enumeration for the DockMenu.clickEffect property.

string.name: NONE
string.tiptext: No click effect applied.

string.name: GLOW
string.tiptext: Applies a glow effect on click.

string.name: FADE
string.tiptext: Applies a fade effect on click.

string.name: JUMP
string.tiptext: Applies a jump animation on click.

string.name: SHINE
string.tiptext: Applies a shine effect on click.

string.name: BLUR
string.tiptext: Applies a blur effect on click.

string.name: BEVEL
string.tiptext: Applies a bevel effect on click.

folder.name: DockMenuLinkType
folder.tiptext: DockMenuLinkType enumeration for the DockMenuIconData.linkType property.

string.name: AUTO
string.tiptext: Determines the link behavior based on the link format.

string.name: SWF
string.tiptext: Forces the link to act as an SWF, JPG, PNG, GIF loader.

string.name: WEB_PAGE
string.tiptext: Force the link to act as a Web Page navigator.

string.name: MOVIE_CLIP
string.tiptext: Forces the link to act as a MovieClip playback navigator.

folder.name: DockMenuPosition
folder.tiptext: DockMenuPosition enumeration for the DockMenu.position property.

string.name: TOP
string.tiptext: Docks the DockMenu to the top of the Stage or MovieClip.

string.name: BOTTOM
string.tiptext: Docks the DockMenu to the bottom of the Stage or MovieClip.

string.name: LEFT
string.tiptext: Docks the DockMenu to the left of the Stage or MovieClip.

string.name: RIGHT
string.tiptext: Docks the DockMenu to the right of the Stage or MovieClip.

string.name: data
string.tiptext: An instance of a DockMenuIconData object with the icon information

string.name: id
string.tiptext: Position id of the icon under the cursor

string.name: ICON_CLICK
string.tiptext: Defines the value of the type property of an iconClick event object.

string.name: ICON_ROLL_OUT
string.tiptext: Defines the value of the type property of an iconRollOut event object.

string.name: ICON_ROLL_OVER
string.tiptext: Defines the value of the type property of an iconRollOver event object.

string.name: DockMenuEvent
string.tiptext: Constructor for DockMenuEvent objects.

string.name: clone
string.tiptext: Creates a copy of the DockMenuEvent object and sets each property's value to match that of the original.

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Returns a string that contains all the properties of the DockMenuEvent object.
